content: learn how to crochet a mini christmas wreath with my step-by-step instructions and video tutorial if you like your christmas crochet to be compact versatile quick and easy then i have a pattern for you this sweet mini wreath is full of christmas magic… whether you want to create a christmas garland or just a few little festive bits and pieces to hang on your tree this little crochet wreath is a fun and fast make that oozes christmas cheer full free pattern and video tutorial can be found at https //blog bellacococrochet com/mini-crochet-christmas-wreath/ written in uk terms crochet skills needed chain chain yarn over pull through one loop on hook double_crochet double_crochet s insert hook into stitch yarn over pull up a loop you will have two loops on the hook yarn over pull through remaining two loops stitch es st s space s space s slip_stitch slip_stitch insert hook into stitch yarn over pull yarn through stitch and loop on hook treble_crochet treble_crochet s yarn over insert into stitch yarn over pull up a loop you will have three loops on the hook yarn over pull through two loops yarn over pull through remaining two loops
